body:
Comment 21: 
Oh i forgot.

> These are package libraries, not "system" libraries. Are these interfaces (dll
functions) documented anywhere, like for example
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms679360(v=vs.85).aspx ?

the function that I discovered this bug with.
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/dd318377%28v=vs.85%29.aspx

the function I tested float64 with.
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/dd318381%28v=vs.85%29.aspx

opengl32.dll ships with windows since win98-ish.
Even if you use  amd/nvidia opengl32.dll you still call into the MS one for gl it has,
which is really annoying.
